summary: Worked on the development of a new testnet web application from the ground up, facilitating seamless interaction for over 100 users on a daily basis, with more than 200 transactions processed each day.

Successfully integrated Redux toolkit to efficiently centralize numerous states, significantly reducing backend and blockchain contract fetching calls. As a result, the application's speed improved by an impressive 60%.
Worked on adding features and optimizing the existing mainnet web application.
Utilized Apexcharts to visually represent the protocol's progress through dynamic graphs like area charts and line charts, enhancing data visualization for better insights.
Contributed to the development of the official landing page for the ACM club of MHSSCE.
Implemented reusable files for updating upcoming events and winners of past events.
Developed separate components to address various UI requirements.
Worked on the design part of the website
